section.title: CMake
section.para: Download the latest stable version from the CMake download page then run the installer and follow the instructions.

section.title: Microsoft Visual Studio 2010
section.para: Download Visual C++ 2010 Express from the Visual Studio download page then run the executable and follow the instructions.

section.title: Subversion
section.para: Download Apache Subversion from the VisualSVN download page, run the installer and follow the instructions.

section.title: SWIG
section.para: The latest version of swigwin can be downloaded from the SWIG download page. Unzip it, then add the folder containing swig.exe to the Path environment variable.

section.title: Python
section.para: Download the Windows installer from the Python download page, run it and follow the instructions.

section.title: NumPy
section.para: Download the win32 installer at the NumPy download page and install it.

section.title: matplotlib
section.para: Download the installer for the last version (matplotlib-X.Y.Z.win32-py2.7.exe) at the matplotlib download page and install it.

section.title: Other Python dependencies
section.para: Open a command prompt and type:
section.programlisting: easy_install easydev easy_install bioservices easy_install lxml easy_install PySide easy_install sympy

section.title: GnuWin32
section.para: The dependencies of this category must be installed in the same folder; it is done automatically for the first two ones (as win32 installers exist), it has to be done manually for the last one.

section.title: bzip2
section.para: Download the latest bzip2-X.Y.Z-setup.exe from bzip2 download page and install it. Add [path/to/GnuWin32]/include and [path/to/GnuWin32]/lib to the environment Path variable.

section.title: libiconv
section.para: Download the latest libiconv-X.Y.Z-1.exe from libiconv download page and install it. As it will install in the same repository than bzip2, it is not necessary to change the path.

section.title: libXML2
section.para: Download the latest version (libxml2-X.Y.Z.win32.zip) at the XMLSoft download page and extract it. The resulting library folders (i.e. bin, include and bin) must be merged with the ones in GnuWin32 (see bzip2 paragraph above).

section.title: Doxygen
section.para: Download the latest binary package (doxygen-X.Y.Z-setup.exe) at the Doxygen download page and install it.

section.title: Graphviz
section.para: Download the latest installer (graphviz-X.Y.msi) at the Graphviz download page and execute it.

Microsoft Visual Studio is used for compiling and building the project:
Start Microsoft Visual Studio
Set the solution configuration to "Release"
Right-click on the ALL_BUILD target in the solution explorer tree, then choose "Build" in the contextual menu
When it is done, do the same for the RUN_TESTS target
